findings.title: #1 Contract doesn’t import npm packages from source
findings.description: We recommend to import all packages from npm directly without flatten the contract. Functions could be modified or can be susceptible to vulnerabilities

findings.title: #2 A floating pragma is set
findings.description: The current pragma Solidity directive is „“^0.8.0””.

findings.title: #3 State variable visibility is not set
findings.description: State variables do not have their visibility set

findings.title: #4 Unchecked tokens transfer
findings.description: The function does not check if the token transfer is valid before executing it, which can lead to unauthorized or unintended token transfers.

findings.title: Incorrect Comparison
findings.description: Fix the incorrect comparison by changing the value type or the comparison
